meanings.definition: Ikebanas: plural form of ikebana, a Japanese art form of flower arrangement
meanings.sent1: She displayed her beautiful ikebanas at the flower show.
meanings.sent2: The ikebanas in the shop window caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The ikebanas at the party were so lovely that they seemed to dance.
meanings.sent4: Her ikebanas were like colorful poems in vases, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The ikebanas at the temple were a peaceful sight, bringing tranquility to all who saw them.

meanings.definition: Ikebanas: the act of creating ikebana arrangements
meanings.sent1: Her ikebanas brought joy to everyone who saw them.
meanings.sent2: The art of ikebanas requires patience and creativity.
meanings.sent3: She practiced ikebanas every day, becoming a master at arranging flowers.
meanings.sent4: The ikebanas she created were like little gardens in vases.
meanings.sent5: Watching her make ikebanas was like witnessing magic unfold before your eyes.

meanings.definition: Ikebanas: a collection of ikebana arrangements
meanings.sent1: The exhibition featured a stunning display of ikebanas.
meanings.sent2: Her ikebanas collection was admired by all who visited her home.
meanings.sent3: The ikebanas collection grew so large, she had to find more space to display them.
meanings.sent4: Each ikebanas in the collection told a unique story through its arrangement.
meanings.sent5: Visiting her ikebanas collection was like stepping into a fragrant garden of creativity.
